testcase.name: User can see templates
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User see templates ... passed Then Response is "200" ... passed And Response list of list node_templates:"[u'jt_nn.small', u'jt_nn.medium', u'jt.small', u'jt.medium', u'nn.small', u'nn.medium', u'tt_dn.small', u'tt_dn.medium']" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://172.18.79.139:9000/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/node-templates response = 200
200 == 200 [u'jt_nn.small', u'jt_nn.medium', u'jt.small', u'jt.medium', u'nn.small', u'nn.medium', u'tt_dn.small', u'tt_dn.medium'] == [u'jt_nn.small', u'jt_nn.medium', u'jt.small', u'jt.medium', u'nn.small', u'nn.medium', u'tt_dn.small', u'tt_dn.medium']

testcase.name: User can create template
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When add n_n: name="QA_n_n", fl_id="m1.tiny", h_s="512" ... passed And User create template ... passed Then Response is "202" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://172.18.79.139:9000/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/node-templates data = {"node_template": {"name_node": {"heap_size": "512"}, "node_type": "NN", "flavor_id": "m1.tiny", "name": "QA_n_n"}} response = 202
202 == 202
